a.n: The Clues That Caught the Killer - Sadie Hartley I (1)

p.k: Documentary examining the vital breakthroughs that led to the solving of one of the most notorious murders of recent times. 60-year-old businesswoman Sadie Hartley was killed after a ferocious attack in her rural Lancashire home. Despite having two suspects, evidence was scant. It took painstaking detective work to convict the killers.
